titleStmt.title: Truth further defended, and William Penn vindicated; being a rejoynder to a book entitutled, A brief and modest reply, to Mr. Penn's tedious, scurrilous, and unchristian defence, against the bishop of Cork. Wherein that author's unfainess is detected, his arguments and objections are answered. / By T.W. and N.H.
titleStmt.author: Wight, Thomas, ca. 1640-1724.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
